name: SUPER 2 Late
description:
by ILIKESCIFI Games

Will you...

Collect all the PARTS to repair the EXPERIMENTAL ASTEROID SUPER LASER to destroy the approaching evil ASTEROID?

Or will you run away like everyone else...?

HOW TO PLAY

  • Click where you want to go.
  • Walk over TECH PARTS to pick them up.
  • Deliver these PARTS to the EXPERIMENTAL ASTEROID LASER.
  • You can only carry one object at a time!

LUDUM DARE - WALKTHROUGH (SPOILER ALERT ^^)

CONTROL  INFO

The controls (pathfinding) are a bit bumpy. Unfortunately, that's all we could manage in the short time available. Hope thats ok for you guys! :)

CREDITS

Game design, coding, sound: Jürgen Brunner
